summary: BuildRequest lists no explicit requirements beyond the title goal. The diff does set a hardcoded Grok API key in the frontend and initializes runtime config on app load, but it also includes additional unrelated changes (notably substantial backend session-management logic) that were not requested.

hallucinated_features.description: Implemented/modified backend video session and segment management APIs (createSession/getSession/getUserSessions/updateSegmentStatus, session data structures, etc.), which is unrelated to only setting a Grok API key.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest only asks to set the Grok (xAI) API key to a provided value and explicitly states no additional requirements; backend session-management work is not requested.

hallucinated_features.description: Added frontend behavior to initialize Grok runtime configuration on app load and added preflight checks that block generation for legacy endpoints / missing configuration.
hallucinated_features.reason: Beyond simply setting the API key value; these are additional behavioral changes not requested in the BuildRequest.

hallucinated_features.description: Updated project metadata/state tracking files (project_state.json and frontend-file-summaries.txt) with broader feature descriptions unrelated to the requested key change.
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested by the BuildRequest; these changes reflect broader product features rather than the single key-setting task.
